long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides taboola(and OUTBRAIN) clickbait ads.
Most of the times those ads are locate between article content and comments - this force you to scroll via amount of annoying distracting CB ads. 
we don't like it, do you?
